special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The kobold is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Sorcery Points.
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has 3 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

special_abilities.name: Heightened Spell:
special_abilities.desc: When it casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell’s effects, the kobold can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.

special_abilities.name: Subtle Spell:
special_abilities.desc: When the kobold casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Dagger.
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
